attributes.action: lower fuel prices below £1/Litre by reducing the tax percentage and discontinue high profits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sign the petition and we together shall try and lower fuel prices.

rejection.details: There are other similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=lower+fuel+price&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=asylum+benefit&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
